full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA BSTEN TSUL GYI GZHUNG SKOR LAS BTUS PA'I YIG CHUNG BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B (CES PA 'DI NI BSHES GNYEN BSTEN PA'I CHA RKYEN 'GYUR RAM SNYAM PA'I RE BAS ^RGYAL KHANG RTZER 'BOD PAS BSGRIGS PA LA, BLA MA BSTEN TSUL GYI GZHUNG THOR BU RNAMS LAS BTUS PA MA GTOGS KHO BOS GZHUNG CHEN MO MTHONG BA NI MA YIN NO, ,YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG TSE RING SKYABS SO, ,'DI LA DKAR CHA YOD NA BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS 'BRAL BA MED PAR RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,` AOm SVA STI, 'DI YANG RGYAL KHANG RTZE BA RIN PO CHE'I, ,THUGS RJE LA BRTEN TEL KER MU RENG GI, ,DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING GI CHOS GRVA RU, ,T'A CHING DZA SAG TSE LDAN RDO RJE YIS, ,PHYAG RDOR RNAM 'PHRUL NYID KYI ZHABS BRTAN DANG, ,DGE LDAN BSTAN PA DAR BA'I CHA RKYEN DU, ,DMIGS TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BA 'DIS, ,'BREL THOGS LTOS BCAS JI SNYED MCHIS PA KUN, ,BDAG SOGS DENG NAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO'I BAR, ,'BRAL @019A *, ,MED RJES BZUNG KHYAD PAR SHAM BHA LAR, ,RDZOGS LDAN GSAR BA'I DGA' STON SHAR BA'I TSE, ,'KHOR GYI THOG MA NYID DU SKYES PAR SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI DPAR DU BSGRUBS TSE SPAR BYANG DGOS TSUL LTAR GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
